quote: One of the things that AI does particularly well is to give you information about the other person.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a practical use of AI in negotiations.
suggested_hook: Discover how AI can give you the upper hand in negotiations.

quote: AI can flag changes in tone and make the change in the attitude and flag that these people are getting mad.
why_clipworthy: Highlights AI's role in managing emotions during negotiations.
suggested_hook: Learn how AI can help you navigate tricky negotiations.
